pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12656 [i18n nl] Updated totpStep1 - removed a-href tags

timeline.message:
[i18n nl] Updated totpStep1 - removed a-href tags

A tags are not rendered as-is - they are escaped. This fixes html output as plaintext in the dutch translation.

timeline.bodyText: @tobiasoort You should end this sentence with some punctuation.
timeline.author: jonkoops
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -88,7 +88,7 @@ offlineToken=Offline Token revoke=Vergunning intrekken configureAuthenticators=Ingestelde authenticators mobile=Mobiel nummer -totpStep1=Installeer FreeOTP of Google Authenticator op uw apparaat. Beide toepassingen zijn beschikbaar in Google Play en de Apple App Store. +totpStep1=Installeer een van de onderstaande applicaties op Uw mobiele apparaat

timeline.bodyText: In other places in this translations file the formal is written without capitalization, would recommend to keep this consistent. So uw instead of Uw.
timeline.author: jonkoops
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -88,7 +88,7 @@ offlineToken=Offline Token revoke=Vergunning intrekken configureAuthenticators=Ingestelde authenticators mobile=Mobiel nummer -totpStep1=Installeer FreeOTP of Google Authenticator op uw apparaat.
